presentationTable.name: Facts - Job Application Progress
presentationTable.description: A folder containing measures related to the duration of the job application progression across various phases and states in the job application life cycle
tags: Project:Oracle Analytics for Fusion Human Capital Management

presentationColumns.name: Time Elapsed (Days) From Submission Confirmed Date to Offer Extended State
presentationColumns.description: Number of days taken for the job application from the confirmation date till it entered the offer extended state.
tags: Project:Oracle Analytics for Fusion Human Capital Management
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Job Application Event.Time Elapsed (Days) From Submission Confirmed Date to Offer Extended State

localization.localizationKey: Time Elapsed (Days) From Submission Confirmed Date to Offer Extended State

presentationColumns.name: Time Elapsed (Days) From Submission Confirmed Date to Offer Accepted State
presentationColumns.description: Number of days taken for the job application from the confirmation date till it entered the offer accepted state.
tags: Project:Oracle Analytics for Fusion Human Capital Management
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Job Application Event.Time Elapsed (Days) From Submission Confirmed Date to Offer Accepted State

localization.localizationKey: Time Elapsed (Days) From Submission Confirmed Date to Offer Accepted State

presentationColumns.name: Time Elapsed (Days) From Submission Confirmed Date to Offer Rejected State
presentationColumns.description: Number of days taken for the job application from the confirmation date till it entered the offer rejected state.
tags: Project:Oracle Analytics for Fusion Human Capital Management
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Job Application Event.Time Elapsed (Days) From Submission Confirmed Date to Offer Rejected State

localization.localizationKey: Time Elapsed (Days) From Submission Confirmed Date to Offer Rejected State

presentationColumns.name: Time Elapsed (Days) From Submission Confirmed Date to Offer Withdrawn State
presentationColumns.description: Number of days taken for the job application from the confirmation date till it entered the offer withdrawn state.
tags: Project:Oracle Analytics for Fusion Human Capital Management
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Job Application Event.Time Elapsed (Days) From Submission Confirmed Date to Offer Withdrawn State

localization.localizationKey: Time Elapsed (Days) From Submission Confirmed Date to Offer Withdrawn State

presentationColumns.name: Time Elapsed (Days) From Submission Confirmed Date to Hire Processed State
presentationColumns.description: Number of days taken for the job application from the confirmation date till it entered the hire (HR) processed state.
tags: Project:Oracle Analytics for Fusion Human Capital Management
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Job Application Event.Time Elapsed (Days) From Submission Confirmed Date to Hire Processed State

localization.localizationKey: Time Elapsed (Days) From Submission Confirmed Date to Hire Processed State

presentationColumns.name: Time To Hire (Days)
presentationColumns.description: Number of days taken from the job requisition open date till the latest date when an application entered the hire (HR) processed state as part of this requisition.
tags: Project:Oracle Analytics for Fusion Human Capital Management
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Job Application Event.Time To Hire (Days)
